text: "Draped Up" is a 2005 song by American rapper Bun B. It is the first single from Bun B's solo debut album Trill. == Remix == A remix was made with Lil' Keke, Slim Thug, Chamillionaire, Paul Wall, Mike Jones, Aztek, Lil Flip, and Z-Ro. The music video has Chingy, Devin The Dude, Kanye West, Scarface, Spice 1, Paul Wall, Mike Jones, Lil' Keke, Lil' Flip, Slim Thug, Z-Ro, Trae Tha Truth, Aztek, and Birdman in it. The song was number 45 on the U.S. Hot R&B; Chart. ==Track listings== ===CD=== # "Draped Up (Radio Remix)" # "Draped Up (Album Remix)" # "Draped Up (Instrumental)" ==Charts== Chart (2005â€“06) Peak position U.S. Billboard Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs 45 ==References== * Category:Chamillionaire songs Category:Songs written by Chamillionaire
title: Draped Up
